nodes.bodyText:

pa.pab.all.deployed..pcs, pa.pab.deploy..pc,  etc

+      <activityPatternBinding

+      </activityPatternBinding>
+      <activity
+            description="Concepts related to component deployment"
+            id="org.polarsys.capella.activities.componentDeployment"
+            name="Component Deployment Concepts">

nodes.bodyText: 2 new activity categories have been added: Behavior deployment concepts and Node deployment concepts
